label: uncl4277
comment: Identification of the terms of payment between the parties to a transaction (generic term).

values.label: Draft(s) drawn on issuing bank
values.comment: Draft(s) must be drawn on the issuing bank.

values.label: Draft(s) drawn on advising bank
values.comment: Draft(s) must be drawn on the advising bank.

values.label: Draft(s) drawn on reimbursing bank
values.comment: Draft(s) must be drawn on the reimbursing bank.

values.label: Draft(s) drawn on applicant
values.comment: Draft(s) must be drawn on the applicant.

values.label: Draft(s) drawn on any other drawee
values.comment: Draft(s) must be drawn on any other drawee.

values.label: Payment means specified in commercial account summary
values.comment: An indication that the payment means are specified in a commercial account summary.
